text: Calliotropis blacki is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Eucyclidae. ==Description== The length of the shell reaches 33 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off the Kermadec Islands and New Caledonia. ==References== * Marshall B. A. (1979). The Trochidae and Turbinidae of the Kermadec Ridge (Mollusca: Gastropoda). New Zealand Journal of Zoology 6: 521–552-page(s): 527 * Vilvens C. (2007) New records and new species of Calliotropis from Indo-Pacific. Novapex 8 (Hors Série 5): 1–72. ==External links== * blacki Category:Gastropods described in 1979
title: Calliotropis blacki
